metadata.name: Dumping Process via Sqldumper.exe
metadata.comment: Detects process dump via legitimate sqldumper.exe binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sqldumper.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0x0110')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0x01100:40'))))

output.summary: Detects process dump via legitimate sqldumper.exe binary

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate MSSQL Server actions References: https://twitter.com/countuponsec/status/910977826853068800, https://twitter.com/countuponsec/status/910969424215232518, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Sqldumper/
